title: Sampler, 1798
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: cross-stitch embroidery on plain weave
inscribed: Sarah Beckett Finished this piece Decembr (sic) 24 in teh eighth year of her age 1798
dimensions: Frame H x W: 48.9 x 40.6 cm (19 1/4 x 16 in.)
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Finely worked in colored silks on a natural ground, with verses, flowering trees, animals, and a stylized running vine border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1798.
1798. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: cross-stitch embroidery on plain weave. Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers. 2008-31-12.
